title: Prepositions Grammar Guide
description: Comprehensive guide covering prepositions used in professional contexts with examples from various industries

basic_concepts.definition: Prepositions are words that show the relationship between a noun or pronoun and other words in a sentence, indicating location, direction, time, manner, or other relationships.
key_functions: Demonstrate connections between people, objects, and ideas
Provide context and clarity for sentence structure

examples.description: Indicates position above or in contact with a surface
Shows position within boundaries or containers

user_experience.title: User Experience (UX) Vocabulary
user_experience.description: Prepositions commonly used in UX design, research, and user interaction contexts

phrases.phrase: User experience (UX) designers focus on creating seamless interactions with interfaces.
phrases.meaning: Indicates the target or focus of attention

phrases.phrase: UX research is conducted to gain insights into user preferences.
phrases.meaning: Indicates movement toward understanding or knowledge

phrases.phrase: Good UX design revolves around understanding user needs and expectations.
phrases.meaning: Indicates the central focus or core of something

phrases.phrase: A well-designed UX leads to increased user engagement on websites.

phrases.meaning: Indicates spanning or covering multiple areas or platforms

phrases.phrase: UX professionals work closely with developers to implement design concepts.

phrases.phrase: Designing for mobile devices requires attention to UX on smaller screens.

phrases.meaning: Indicates spanning or covering multiple devices

phrases.phrase: The UX of an e-commerce site affects conversion rates.
